CoinSpotDotNet
Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class ServiceCollectionExtensions

Contains helper methods to register CoinSpotDotNet services for .NET Dependency Injection

Inheritance
System.Object
ServiceCollectionExtensions
Namespace: CoinSpotDotNet
Assembly: CoinSpotDotNet.dll
Syntax
public static class ServiceCollectionExtensions

Methods

| Improve this Doc View Source

AddCoinSpotV1(IServiceCollection, IConfiguration)

Registers CoinSpot API v1 Services in the DI Container.

CoinSpotDotNet expects your API credentials to be available in the Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration object under a section named either "CoinSpot" or "CoinSpotSettings" (case-insensitive). This section will then register an Microsoft.Extensions.Options.IOptions`1 object using services.Configure<CoinSpotSettings>(IConfigurationSection) and utilised by the ICoinSpotClient when making requests against the API

This method registers the following typed System.Net.Http.HttpClient instances in the container using services.AddHttpClient<ICoinSpotClient, CoinSpotClient>:

  • ICoinSpotClient

Declaration
public static IHttpClientBuilder AddCoinSpotV1(this IServiceCollection services, IConfiguration configuration)
Parameters
Type Name Description
Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection services

The Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection into which the services will be registered
Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration configuration

The Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration object for this application
Returns
Type Description
Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IHttpClientBuilder

The Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IHttpClientBuilder to enable consumers to add Policy Handlers if required
Examples

In Startup.ConfigureServices()

services.AddCoinSpotV1(Configuration);
| Improve this Doc View Source

AddCoinSpotV2(IServiceCollection, IConfiguration)

Registers CoinSpot API v2 Services in the DI Container.

CoinSpotDotNet expects your API credentials to be available in the Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration object under a section named either "CoinSpot" or "CoinSpotSettings" (case-insensitive). This section will then register an Microsoft.Extensions.Options.IOptions`1 object using services.Configure<CoinSpotSettings>(IConfigurationSection) and utilised by the ICoinSpotClient when making requests against the API

This method registers the following typed System.Net.Http.HttpClient instances in the container using services.AddHttpClient<ICoinSpotClient, CoinSpotClient>:
